name: part_007
file: tmp_[3D LIVE] Climax Story Live - Ending Summer w⧸ Swimsuits & Yukata! (35 holoJP members) #皆で観ようホロサマライブ [zQuFRSi5ebc]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Performance of 'Yumemiru Sora e' by 1st Generation members and Haachama.
Transition with title card for the next song.
Performance of 'Asuiro ClearSky' by Lui, Miko, and Flare.

subtitles.original: 重ねた手はぎゅっと離さずに
subtitles.english: Never letting go of our joined hands

subtitles.original: 一人一人違う色で描き出すときめき
subtitles.english: Each of us painting our excitement in different colors

subtitles.original: 振り向くことなく真っ直ぐに
subtitles.english: Looking straight ahead without turning back

subtitles.original: いくよ いこう 夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: Here we go, let's head to the sky of our dreams

subtitles.original: 笑いあったことや
subtitles.english: The times we laughed together

subtitles.original: 泣き出しそうになった日
subtitles.english: And the days we felt like crying

subtitles.original: 思い出いっぱいなのに
subtitles.english: Though we have so many memories

subtitles.original: あっという間の日々
subtitles.english: The days have passed by in a flash

subtitles.original: 上書きじゃなくて
subtitles.english: Instead of overwriting them

subtitles.original: 名前つけて保存
subtitles.english: I'll 'save as' and name them all

subtitles.original: どれも全部大事な宝物
subtitles.english: Each and every one is a precious treasure

subtitles.original: One for all... 誰かのためが力になる
subtitles.english: One for all... doing it for someone else gives me strength

subtitles.original: All for one... 今日も賑やかすぎるくらい
subtitles.english: All for one... today is almost too lively again

subtitles.original: 笑顔がもう止まらない
subtitles.english: I can't stop smiling anymore

subtitles.original: 想いは膨らんでいく
subtitles.english: These feelings keep growing

subtitles.original: 重ねた今ぎゅっと噛み締めた
subtitles.english: Savoring this moment we've shared

subtitles.original: 一人一人違う声で歌声は広がる
subtitles.english: With each of our unique voices, our song spreads far and wide

subtitles.original: 風を感じたら真っ直ぐに
subtitles.english: Once you feel the breeze, look straight ahead

subtitles.original: いくよ いこう 夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: Here we go, let's head to the sky of our dreams

subtitles.original: 憧れ 手を伸ばした
subtitles.english: I reached out towards my longing

subtitles.original: 掴み取ったその光が
subtitles.english: The light that I've grasped

subtitles.original: いつの日か
subtitles.english: Will someday

subtitles.original: また誰かの憧れに変わる
subtitles.english: Become what someone else longs for

subtitles.original: 繋げよう
subtitles.english: Let's pass it on

subtitles.original: 重ねた手はぎゅっと離さずに
subtitles.english: Never letting go of our joined hands

subtitles.original: 一人一人違う色で描き出すときめき
subtitles.english: Each of us painting our excitement in different colors

subtitles.original: 出会った全てにありがとう
subtitles.english: Thank you for everything we've encountered

subtitles.original: 奇跡だって起こし続けるよ
subtitles.english: We'll keep on making miracles happen

subtitles.original: ずっと
subtitles.english: Always

subtitles.original: そこにいて
subtitles.english: Be right there

subtitles.original: いくよ いこう 夢見る空へ
subtitles.english: Here we go, let's head to the sky of our dreams

subtitles.original: あすいろClearSky
subtitles.english: Asuiro ClearSky

subtitles.original: いつの間にか見つけてた 遠い夢
subtitles.english: Before I knew it, I'd found a distant dream

subtitles.original: 一人じゃ見えなかった景色
subtitles.english: A scenery I couldn't have seen alone

subtitles.original: 波打つ風の音 加速していく想いに
subtitles.english: The sound of the surging wind, with accelerating feelings

subtitles.original: 戸惑いも覚えた
subtitles.english: I even felt some bewilderment

subtitles.original: 追いかけた理想の姿は
subtitles.english: The ideal image I chased after

subtitles.original: まだ届かなくて遠いけど
subtitles.english: Is still out of reach and far away, but...

subtitles.original: きっとこの瞬間を かけがえない皆で
subtitles.english: Surely, in this irreplaceable moment with everyone

subtitles.original: 共に行くよ 手を繋いで
subtitles.english: We'll go together, hand in hand

subtitles.original: 宇宙は輝き宿して
subtitles.english: The universe holds a brilliance

subtitles.original: 夢の場所へ
subtitles.english: Toward the place of our dreams

subtitles.original: 駆け抜けていく僕たちの 青春の光は
subtitles.english: Running through, the light of our youth

subtitles.original: 誰にも止められないよ
subtitles.english: Can't be stopped by anyone

subtitles.original: 笑いあう未来 優しくこぼれる涙さえ
subtitles.english: A future where we laugh, even the tears that softly fall

subtitles.original: いまほら 輝かせて明日へ運ぶから
subtitles.english: Look, now I'll make them shine and carry them to tomorrow

subtitles.original: 君の隣へ 僕たちは世界を越えていく
subtitles.english: To your side, we'll cross over the world

subtitles.original: 迎えに行くよ
subtitles.english: I'm coming to get you

subtitles.original: まだ見えない明日も きらめきに変えてきっと
subtitles.english: Surely, changing even the unseen tomorrow into a sparkle

subtitles.original: 僕たちが未来へと
subtitles.english: Because we'll take you

subtitles.original: 連れて行くから
subtitles.english: To the future

subtitles.original: 背伸びしては手を伸ばす 憧れの
subtitles.english: Standing on tiptoe and reaching out toward my longing

subtitles.original: 行き先示す星になれ
subtitles.english: Become the star that shows the way

subtitles.original: つまずくその度 手を差し伸べ合えたなら
subtitles.english: If we can reach out our hands to each other every time we stumble

subtitles.original: すぐに届くはず
subtitles.english: We should reach it soon
